name: QUOTE.fm
description: QUOTE.fm is the best way to discover, read, collect, recommend, curate, and discuss written stories. Stories worth your time. Building things takes some time. While were making the magic happen, heres a chronologic view of what weve done so far and whats coming up next.

apis.name: QUOTE.fm
apis.description: The best way to discover, read and share great stories that have the power to convey ideas, provoke emotions or change your entire life. Its all about stories truly worth reading.
